00012 void
00013 SgAsmPEImportItem::ctor(SgAsmPEImportItemList *parent)
00014 {
00015     set_parent(parent);
00016     if (parent)
00017         parent->get_vector().push_back(this);
00018     set_by_ordinal(true);
00019     set_ordinal(0);
00020     set_hint(0);
00021     set_hintname_rva(0);
00022     set_hintname_nalloc(0);
00023     set_bound_rva(0);
00024 
00025     SgAsmBasicString *name = new SgAsmBasicString("");
00026     set_name(name);
00027     name->set_parent(this);
00028 }

00056 size_t
00057 SgAsmPEImportItem::hintname_required_size() const
00058 {
00059     return ALIGN_UP(2/*hint*/ + p_name->get_string().size() + 1/*NUL*/, 2);
00060 }
00061 
00064 rose_addr_t
00065 SgAsmPEImportItem::get_iat_entry_va() const
00066 {
00067     SgAsmPEImportDirectory *idir = SageInterface::getEnclosingNode<SgAsmPEImportDirectory>(this);
00068     assert(idir!=NULL); // we need some context in order to find the address
00069     int idx = idir->find_import_item(this);
00070     assert(idx>=0); // parent/child connectivity problem
00071     SgAsmPEFileHeader *fhdr = SageInterface::getEnclosingNode<SgAsmPEFileHeader>(idir);
00072     assert(fhdr!=NULL);
00073     rose_addr_t entry_size = fhdr->get_word_size();
00074     return idir->get_iat_rva().get_va() + idx * entry_size;
00075 }
00076 
00078 void
00079 SgAsmPEImportItem::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00080 {
00081     char p[4096];
00082     if (idx>=0) {
00083         sprintf(p, "%sImportItem[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00084     } else {
00085         sprintf(p, "%sImportItem.", prefix);
00086     }
00087 
00088     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00089 
00090     if (p_by_ordinal) {
00091         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = 0x%04x (%u)", p, w, "ordinal", p_ordinal, p_ordinal);
00092         if (p_hintname_rva.get_rva()!=0 || p_hint!=0 || !p_name->get_string().empty())
00093             fprintf(f, " (hint/name rva %s %zu bytes, hint=0x%04x (%u), name=\"%s\")",
00094                     p_hintname_rva.to_string().c_str(), p_hintname_nalloc, p_hint, p_hint, p_name->get_string(true).c_str());
00095         fprintf(f, "\n");
00096     } else {
00097         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = rva %s %zu bytes, hint=0x%04x (%u), name=\"%s\"",
00098                 p, w, "hint/name", p_hintname_rva.to_string().c_str(), p_hintname_nalloc,
00099                 p_hint, p_hint, p_name->get_string(true).c_str());
00100         if (p_ordinal!=0)
00101             fprintf(f, " (ordinal=0x%02x (%u))", p_ordinal, p_ordinal);
00102         fprintf(f, "\n");
00103     }
00104 
00105     if (p_bound_rva.get_rva()!=0)
00106         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n", p, w, "bound", p_bound_rva.to_string().c_str());
00107 }
